error.message: Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\graphql_mutation\Kernel\CreateEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\graphql_mutation\Kernel\DeleteEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\graphql_mutation\Kernel\DeleteEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\ContentTypeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\graphql_mutation\Kernel\UpdateEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\ContentTypeCreationTrait instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\simpletest\NodeCreationTrait in class Drupal\Tests\graphql_mutation\Kernel\UpdateEntityTest. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Tests\node\Traits\NodeCreationTrait instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to graphql_mutation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
